1.title: Swamp Market Crash
1.plot: A new crawfish season is underway, but Rick hits a snag when his clients start retiring. Clayton helps Austyn and Blake build new crawfish equipment and teach them a lesson in the process.

2.title: Driver Down
2.plot: Rick desperately needs a driver for his new route. Paul's transition to a new house hits a snag. Clayton and Joney help a wildlife photographer get face-to-face with swamp gators.

3.title: Rick's Sweet 60
3.plot: Patty tries to keep Rick's 60th birthday party a surprise. Austyn and Blake lose a crawfish buyer. Matt and Paul fight over a new delivery route.

4.title: Wedding Band of Brothers
4.plot: When a fisherman loses his wedding ring in the swamp, the Pigeon gang enlists a quirky crew of swamp relic hunters to look for it. Paul's hours at Phillips Seafood get cut, forcing him to take work as an electrician. And family friends try to get Patty's secret bisque recipe for their new restaurant.

5.title: A Little Gar Goes a Long Way
5.plot: When Coy asks Rick for some smoked gar, Rick makes it his personal mission to find some. Plus, Joney teaches Felicia and Kaley the secrets of Cajun cooking, and Clayton records an original song for Joney as a romantic surprise.

6.title: Swamp Men and the Sea
6.plot: Rick works a deal to take the Pigeon gang deep-sea fishing. But when Austyn, Blake, and Clayton start trash talking, it turns into a battle on the high seas. Meanwhile in Pigeon, Felicia and Kaley sneak off in Austyn and Blake's boat for a girls' day out, but a motor malfunction could ruin their secret.

7.title: See You Later, My Friend
7.plot: Rick designs a cool new all-in-one swamp boat, but the high cost to build it will require some wild wheeling and dealing. And Austyn needs help pulling a cypress log from the swamp, prompting some crazy deals of his own. Then, Rick and the Pigeon gang deal with a heartbreaking call from Shorty.

8.title: Swamp and the City
8.plot: Rick and Patty jet off to New York to celebrate their thirtieth anniversary. But when they can't see eye-to-eye on what to do in the city, it could turn their romantic trip upside down. And in Bayou Pigeon, Austyn and Kaley square off against Blake and Felicia in the annual frog-catching competition, with more than just their pride at stake

9.title: Dibs on Ribs
9.plot: As alligator season kicks off, Rick takes on a culinary challenge - trying to convince locals to buy and eat gator ribs. Meanwhile, boat troubles force Austyn and Blake to cram their ride-along hunters into a tiny boat, and Clayton and Joney take their nephew Chaz on his first gator hunt.

10.title: Pig Bang Theory
10.plot: With Clayton's freezer sitting empty, he sets out to restock it with a hog hunt in the swamp. Rick tries his hand as a fashion guru when he starts peddling high-end gator leathers, and Chachie's gator crew tries to bag a monster in his absence.

11.title: Kenny Do It
11.plot: When Rick finds himself shorthanded on the dock, he has to hire Kenny, a quirky local with almost no qualifications. Rick also tries a unique way to recoup his costs on a spoiled alligator, and hunter Greg and his son Doobie take Doobie's future father-in-law on a tension-filled gator hunt.

12.title: Tour De Swamp
12.plot: Rick tries to start a swamp tour business, but his maiden voyage might sink the whole operation. Austyn and Blake are forced to fill their last alligator tags quickly when they hear the plant is shutting down early, and Clayton has to hustle to find a buyer for his first load of buffalo fish.

1.title: Swamp Jaws
1.plot: Rick and his crew hit the swamp for a moneymaking season of fishing, but a rogue gator starts ripping through their nets... and eating up their profits.

2.title: Bayou Faceoff
2.plot: In order to spur his fishermen toward bigger catches, Rick holds a competition to decide the best buffalo fisherman in the Bayou.

3.title: Cajun Mystery Meat
3.plot: Rick hits on a wild idea to get out of debt: passing off bait-fish meat as a Cajun delicacy! Meanwhile, Shorty's latest scheme finds him joining a roller derby team - as a male cheerleader.

4.title: Crawmageddon
4.plot: With an early crawfish season looming, Rick needs to unload a freezer full of last year's stock before it becomes worthless.

5.title: Buck Wild
5.plot: Rick and the crew grab their rifles and go hunting - but will they catch enough to fill their freezers for the upcoming year?

6.title: Bayou in the Blood
6.plot: Rick wants to give his aging father one last great tour of the bayou, but business keeps threatening to derail his plans.

1.title: Holy Crawfish
1.plot: When Rick's crawfish supply dries up on Easter week, Rick's business, reputation - and even his friendships - are on the line. Meanwhile, Shorty has moved out of Coy's house, but devastating news brings them closer than ever.

2.title: Buyers Be Where
2.plot: Rick's coolers are bursting at the seams with live crawfish. If he can't find buyers in two days, the crawfish will be dead - and so will his business.

3.title: The Crawfather
3.plot: Rick and the gang are looking forward to the year's biggest crawfish festival, but Phillips Seafood's main supplier threatens to spoil the party.

4.title: Politicky Ricky
4.plot: Rick Phillips has the gift of gab. But when he's asked to deliver a speech at the State Senate, the chatty fisherman gets seriously tongue-tied. And, Shorty talks his way into a catering gig for a girls' softball team.

5.title: The Inspector Spectre
5.plot: A routine visit from the Health Inspector has Rick jumping through hoops to streamline his crawfish peeling process - or face shutdown. Meanwhile, Coy enlists Shorty to go camping, but the trip is anything but peaceful.

6.title: Friends with Benefits
6.plot: With Coy's medical bills going through the roof, Shorty wants to organize a benefit to raise some cash. But with the date quickly approaching, can he prove that he's not in over his head?

7.title: Dead in the Water
7.plot: Rick hits pay dirt when he scores a huge order for crawfish. But heavy rains mean the crawfish - and Rick's profits - are dying in the swamp. Meanwhile, Coy endures the dentist chair to get new teeth.

8.title: Going for Croak
8.plot: With the crawfish season at a standstill, Rick and the crew hop onto another money-making scheme: frogs! Meanwhile, the dangers of living in the swamp become frighteningly clear when Jamie and Quentin go missing.

9.title: Much Ado About Snakin
9.plot: It's old school vs. new school when Clayton and Austyn and Blake go head to head in a high-stakes snake catching competition.

10.title: Bugging Out
10.plot: Rick promises his friend Clyde all the helpers he needs to catch a load of grasshoppers. But when everyone refuses to spend the day on a bug hunt, Rick is left holding the bag.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: The swamp gets too close for comfort when Paul finds mauled animals right outside Phillips Seafood. Is there a dangerous predator on the loose? Meanwhile, Coy receives news about Shorty -- and it's something he's been dreading.

12.title: Housejacked
12.plot: As Coy battles with the decision to bail Shorty out of jail, he gets the final results of the chemotherapy. Meanwhile, Chachie and his gator-hunting crew discover that their prized houseboat has gone missing.

13.title: Son of Godzilla
13.plot: Gator Season has finallyh arrived and Rick helps Chachie Boy track a monster reptile hiding deep in the bayou, but another hunter might beat them to the punch.

14.title: Size Matters
14.plot: Austyn and Blake host a visiting hunter from Canada who expects them to deliver the most coveted prize - a monster gator. Meanwhile, Rick searches for 5 small gators to satisfy an order for one of his best customers.

15.title: A Lil' O' Prick
15.plot: While gator season is in full swing, some of Rick's hunters can't seem to catch a break. Part-timers Nikki and Noel find their bait lines sabotaged, while Paul follows Cumquat on a wild gator chase, and Austyn gets sidelined with a swamp-related injury.

16.title: From Gators to Garters
16.plot: Austyn and Blake plan a double wedding in the swamp, but their brides aren't convinced it's a good idea. Meanwhile, Clayton and Joney go gator hunting; and Rick tries to find a perfect wedding gift.

imdb.title: Swamp Pawn
plot: A docuseries that follows Rick Phillips, the proprietor of Phillips Seafood in Bayou Pigeon, Lousiana. Others featured on the show include legendary gator hunter Chachie Boy and father-son fishing duo Coy and Shorty.::kingnoel_john
